attributes.action: Leaders of the Leave campaign, increase the NHS budget by £350 million per week
attributes.additional_details: It was clearly implied that the leaders of the Leave EU campaign planned to use the £350 million per week to build hospitals and fund treatments  - they should make good on that promise.
attributes.background:
Politicians  - Keep your promises please
Our son had groundbreaking neurosurgery last year to remove a tumour that had caused him to have severe epilepsy for 15 years  - an adequately funded NHS would allow more life changing treatments for people with chronic conditions
